problem_statement:
Design a self-healing, fractal-structured AI agent system that can adapt to
    changing requirements while maintaining logical consistency and optimal
    information flow.

aristotle.field_relevance: Helps with system organization and logical structure

synthesis_insights.foundational_approach: Combine Aristotelian categorization with Euclidean axiomatization
synthesis_insights.simplification_strategy: Apply Occamian razor to eliminate unnecessary complexity
synthesis_insights.precision_method: Use Fregean conceptual clarity and logical rigor
synthesis_insights.dynamic_modeling: Apply Newtonian calculus for system dynamics
synthesis_insights.complexity_handling: Use Mandelbrotian fractal patterns for complex structures
synthesis_insights.information_optimization: Apply Shannon information theory for communication
synthesis_insights.holistic_integration: Use systems theory for overall integration

implementation_guidance.step_1_categorization: Use Aristotelian analysis to categorize problem entities
implementation_guidance.step_2_axiomatization: Apply Euclidean method to define fundamental axioms
implementation_guidance.step_3_simplification: Use Occamian razor to eliminate unnecessary elements
implementation_guidance.step_4_precision: Apply Fregean analysis for conceptual clarity
implementation_guidance.step_5_dynamics: Use Newtonian methods for dynamic aspects
implementation_guidance.step_6_complexity: Apply Mandelbrotian patterns for complex structures
implementation_guidance.step_8_integration: Use systems thinking for holistic integration
implementation_guidance.step_9_validation: Apply logical and empirical validation methods
